name: Demeter
description: Demeter, earth goddess of agriculture, grain, harvest, and materia love, is often depicted as kind and gentle.

skills.name: The Earth’s Vigor
skills.description: Demeter roots herself, restraining enemies around her for 3s, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK every second. Each enemy restores HP equal to 90% of ATK to her per second. Demeter gains Super Armor for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per second to 110% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Each enemy restores HP equal to 100% of her ATK per second.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG per second to 120% of ATK.

skills.name: Sprawling Thorns
skills.description: Demeter controls vines to restrain the farthest enemy, dealing DMG equal to 270% of ATK and draining 100 Energy from them.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 330% of ATK.

skills.name: Return of the Maiden
skills.description: Restores 2% HP every 0.2s for 3s when Demeter’s HP drops below 50%. Can be triggered once per battle.

upgrades.level4: Can trigger twice per battle and once every 6s.

skills.name: Harvest’s Blessing
skills.description: Demeter grants a shield equal to 200% of ATK to herself and the most vulnerable ally. The shield lasts up to 10s.

upgrades.level2: Shield strength increases to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases M-RES by 50% while the shield is active.
upgrades.level4: Shield strength increases to 250% of ATK.

relic.name: Four Seasons’ Bounty
relic.description: Demeter enters battle with 3 stacks of Abundance. Each stack reduces DMG taken by 15%. For every 30% of max HP lost, one stack is consumed. Stacks are regained when her HP is restored to a certain level.

upgrades.level2: When Demeter has 3 stacks of Abundance, she is immune to Crowd Control.
upgrades.level3: Each stack of Abundance reduces DMG taken by 17.5%.
upgrades.level4: Each stack of Abundance reduces DMG taken by 20%.
